text: Ara yakhana taranga taderake acchanna kare chayara mata [1], takhana tara allahake dake tamra anugatye ekanistha haye. Atahpara yakhana tini taderake ud'dhara kare sthale paumchana takhana tadera ke'u ke'u majhamajhi abasthane thake [2]; ara sudhu bisbasaghataka, kaphira byakti'i amadera nidarsanabalike asbikara kare
